sourcesContent:
User is online!
User is offline!
import { Component, ElementRef, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent { title = 'bootstrap-example'; @ViewChild('emailAddress') emailAddress: ElementRef | undefined; @ViewChild('emailBody') emailBody: ElementRef | undefined; isOnline = false; onSubmitHandler(): void { const emailAddressValue = this.emailAddress?.nativeElement.value; const emailBodyValue = this.emailBody?.nativeElement.value; console.log(emailAddressValue); console.log(emailBodyValue); } toggleStatus(): void { this.isOnline = !this.isOnline; } constructor() { console.log("I'm from constructor!"); } ngOnChanges() { console.log("I'm from ngOnChanges!"); } }
